_header: Father I am Thine only Son
Note:
See Ringler Jr. (1992)
XRingler Jr., William A. Bibliography and Index of English Verse in Manuscript 1501-1558. London: Mansell, 1992; prepared and completed by Michael Rudick and Susan J. Ringler , TM 408 and cf. 1288.
Subjects: Christ, plea to the Father; Christ, Passion of
_description: ‘Nolo mortem peccatoris’, Christ’s plea to the Father — twenty-three 6-line stanzas with refrain, ‘Nolo mortem peccatoris’

BLAdd15233.First Lines:
Father I am thine onlye sooneSent downe from hevyn mankynd to
                    save…
BLAdd15233.Last Lines:
…Enioy his mercyfull wordis in thysNolo mortem
                    peccatoris
BLAdd15233.Attributed Title: Nolo mortem peccatoris hec sunt salvatoris (f. 35)
